About Me

I am currently working as Sterling OMS Developer, eager to apply foundational knowledge in the IBM Sterling Order Management System. My primary focus is set keenly on mastering OMS configuration, optimizing order pipelines, and ensuring robust data management for e-commerce fulfillment solutions.

I am deeply interested and currently working on expanding my practical experience across key OMS modules, including customization through user exits, API integration, and business process modeling using Java and XML. I approach every task with a commitment to learning best practices and applying structured problem-solving skills to technical challenges.

When I step away from the terminal, I enjoy recharging by watching the latest movies or following the intense drama of cricket matchesâ€”a great way to maintain focus and energy. I am enthusiastically looking for opportunities to apply my fresh skills and eagerness to collaborate on challenging OMS-related or web development projects.
